body.text: Belin BJ, Lee T, Mullins RD. 2015. DNA damage induces nuclear actin filament assembly by Formin-2 and Spire-1/2 that promotes efficient DNA repair. eLife 4:e07735. doi: 10.7554/eLife.07735
In the originally published version, the title was given as: DNA damage induces nuclear actin filament assembly by Formin-2 and Spire-½ that promotes efficient DNA repair.
The title should have read: DNA damage induces nuclear actin filament assembly by Formin-2 and Spire-1/2 that promotes efficient DNA repair.
The article has now been corrected.
